## Installation
The package can be installed directly from GitHub as follows:
```{r loadstuff, message=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
# need the devtools package
library("devtools")

# install from GitHub
install_github("benkeser/r2weight")

# load package
library("r2weight")
```
